meanings.definition: A symbol (÷) used to indicate division.
meanings.sent1: In math class, we learned how to use the obelus to divide numbers.
meanings.sent2: Please solve this division problem using the obelus symbol.
meanings.sent3: The obelus was feeling overwhelmed with all the numbers it had to divide.
meanings.sent4: The obelus stood tall among the numbers, ready to separate them with precision.
meanings.sent5: The obelus cut through the numbers like a sharp knife, cleanly dividing them.

meanings.definition: A dagger-shaped mark (†) used as a reference mark in printing.
meanings.sent1: The obelus at the end of the sentence indicated an important note.
meanings.sent2: The obelus was used to mark the beginning of a new paragraph.
meanings.sent3: The obelus in the text seemed to be pointing at something secret.
meanings.sent4: The obelus on the page felt like a hidden message waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The obelus added a touch of mystery to the printed page, drawing the reader's attention.

meanings.sent1: The obelus in the city square was a towering structure.
meanings.sent2: Tourists gathered around the obelus to take pictures of its grandeur.
meanings.sent3: The obelus monument seemed to reach for the sky with its pointed top.
meanings.sent4: The obelus stood as a symbol of history and culture in the town.
meanings.sent5: The obelus monument dominated the skyline, a reminder of ancient times.
